function.name: washingSpinDryLevel_increase
function.description: This function is used to increase the spin dry intensity of the washing machine.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to increase the spin dry intensity.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to increase the spin dry intensity.

spinDryLevelDelta.description: The amount by which to increase the spin dry intensity.
